notes: The heal counts as lifesteal, so that it is affected by lifesteal manipulation, but not by heal manipulation.
Cannot lifesteal off of wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for 7 HP on each attack.

additionalInformation: The item grants the following bonuses: 140 health and 0.7 health regeneration to strength heroes. 7 attack speed and 1.17 main armor to agility heroes. 84 mana and 0.35 mana regeneration to intelligence heroes. 7 main attack damage to / / all heroes.
140 health and 0.7 health regeneration to strength heroes.
7 attack speed and 1.17 main armor to agility heroes.
84 mana and 0.35 mana regeneration to intelligence heroes.
7 main attack damage to / / all heroes.
name: Possessed Mask
description: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.
